title: Lucy Hale cuts a casual figure in striped tee and distressed jeans
text:
She's in the middle of filming her upcoming show Katy Keene.

And Lucy Hale was spotted during a moment off-duty as she walked her precious dog Elvis on the streets of NYC.

The 30-year-old Pretty Little Liars star looked comfy in a dolman-sleeved ringer top featuring mauve, navy and mustard yellow stripes.

On-the-go: Lucy Hale was spotted during a moment off-duty as she walked her precious dog Elvis on the streets of NYC

She paired her roomy shirt with a pair of form-fitting distressed jeans that exposed both of her knees.

Her feet navigated the pavement in a set of snakeskin-print sneakers with white laces.

Lucy shaded her vision with some round sunglasses featuring gold rims and carried a paper grocery bag from Whole Foods in one hand.

Casual: The 30-year-old Pretty Little Liars star looked comfy in a dolman-sleeved ringer top featuring mauve, navy and mustard yellow stripes

Her sighting comes a few weeks after she opened up to Elite Daily at the Tribeca Film Festival on Katy Keene.

'It just leaves you feeling so optimistic about life and whatever dreams and goals you have,' she told the outlet.

'Each of the characters of the show has a specific endgame, end goal, dream.'

On-screen: Her sighting comes a few weeks after she opened up to Elite Daily at the Tribeca Film Festival on Katy Keene

She also divulged that she feels a certain affinity for the show because she sees a bit of herself in the character she plays.

'I moved to LA at a really young age with my mom. For a while, [I was] trying to become an actor and just auditioning, hearing "no" all the time, and so I see this struggle,' she explained.

'I see myself in Katie because I’ve been there … I know what she’s going through and our stories are so similar. It’s so cool to tap into that,' she said.

Katy Keene is set to premiere in 2020.
description: She's in the middle of filming her upcoming show Katy Keene. And Lucy Hale was spotted during a moment off-duty as she walked her precious dog Elvis on the streets of NYC.
